      • TileButtonDialog

        public TileButtonDialog​(MapView mapView,
                        android.content.Context context,
                        android.content.Context plugin,
                        boolean bPersistent)
        Instantiates a Plugin Context friendly variant of the TileButtonDialog.
        Parameters:
        mapView - Map view instance
        context - Activity context (usually View.getContext())
        plugin - Plugin context used for looking up string and icon resources
        bPersistent - True if the dialog should stay open when a tile button is pressed. The buttons act as toggles instead.
